title: Info for users
description:
<@&428637054922915850> role
• To join a colored role, upload images, embed links, use most bot commands, use external emojis, and post reactions, you must have the users role.
• After agreeing to the rules, the users role will be given automatically if you have no warnings after a 48 hour waiting period.
• If you joined before the users role was given automatically, use `sudo usermod -a users` in <#174317464337776640>.
• To get a colored role, use `sudo usermod -c <distro>` in <#174317464337776640> to join your favorite distro's role after earning the <@&428637054922915850> role.
